name: the_martian
description:
I had to finish the development of my game prematurely but I want to publish it anyway.

You can move with WASD, use E to interact and your mouse to interact with the monitoring console. Use F to toggle being inside or outside.

You can plant potato seeds, water them, make oxygen and food with that.

If you miss water you can make some new with electlolysis, just activate the machine next to the water tank. It will bubble and consume hydrogen and oxygen to make water.

That’s it!
Also there’s a nice computer with real time infos!
